Pre-Game Insights: Ruturaj Gaikwad filed a complaint with the BCCI following a Ranji Trophy match in which he scored 8 and 0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gaikwad last played for India in October last year when he made his ODI debut against South Africa.
Others: Ruturaj Gaikwad has been ruled out of the T20I series against New Zealand due to a wrist injury.
He is out of the series with a wrist injury.
Gaikwad has been sent to the National Cricket Academy in Bengaluru for rehabilitation.
